CRM software for sales, marketing, and s: CRM 供销售、推销和支助团队使用的软件
For the instance URL, add the url withou: 例如：URL，请添加没有端点的URL。例如，请输入 https:///<instance>.od2.vtiger.com 而不是 https:////<instance>.od2.vtiger.com/restpi/v1/vtiger/default
Enter your username/email: 输入您的用户名/电子邮件
\nTo obtain your Access Key, follow thes:
To obtain your Access Key, follow these steps:

1. Login to Vtiger CRM:
Open a web browser and log in to your Vtiger CRM instance.

2. Navigate to User Profile:
In the top right corner, click on your profile name.
Select "My Preferences."

3. The system will generate an access key for you.
Copy and securely store the access key. This key will be used for authentication when making API requests.
Note:

Access keys are sensitive information, and they should be kept secure.
Treat the access key like a password. Do not share it publicly or expose it in an insecure manner.
通过 SQL 语句查询记录。
Performs an arbitrary authorized API cal: 执行授权的 API 调用。
Add new fields to be created in the new: 添加要在新记录中创建的字段
Enter the query statement, e.g. SELECT c: 输入查询语句，例如 SELECT count(*) FROM 联系人；
Enter the maximum number of records to r: 输入返回的最大记录数。
Select the HTTP method you want to use: 选择您想要使用的 HTTP 方法
Enter the desired request headers. Skip: 输入所需的请求头。跳过授权头
Enter the data to pass. if its POST, it: 输入要通过的数据。如果它的POST，它将作为实体数据发送，如果GET，则作为查询字符串
Triggers when a new record is introduced: 启用新记录或更新记录时触发事件。
